website_summaries.verdict: A popular skincare set designed to target the signs of aging along with dryness and uneven skin texture.
pros: Duo of serums boasting an intensive blend of antioxidants
B serum hydrates, and C serum brightens
Both leave behind a pleasing glow
Quickly absorbed by the skin for daytime use
Set is a great value from a pricey clean beauty brand
cons: Some reports of breakouts and pilling under makeup

customer_reviews.title: SO good, but the bacon is real
customer_reviews.text: Someone said the c-firma smells like bacon.....and they're not wrong. I found that it fades quickly and it's too terribly overpowering, but the first time you put it on, it's kind of a bizarre experience. The products themselves are great! My skin is SO soft and noticeably firmer with fewer lines after only a week. I'm 26 and in the "Preserve! Preserve! Preserve!" phase of skincare and this stuff has been working really well for me so far. My only complaint is that it does make my face a bit oilier than usual. I wear both these products with my usual aveeno cc cream on top, so it might just be too much moisture for one face!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gateway Duo
customer_reviews.text: Loved both this and the Night Bright sets. Great for trying the product line, and the price per mL works out less than buying full-sized bottles. Also, I like buying the mini C-Firma, since vitamin C doesn't have a super long shelf life. The only problem is that I have become completely addicted to the Drunk Elephant line now, and have expanded to also buy Babyfacial and Protini. My skin loves me, but my wallet is still adjusting :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy O

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these so bad. But unfortunately I am unimpressed. The smell of the C-serum is almost rotten smelling- I don't know if that is across the board or my specific bottle. It leaves my face feeling extremely sticky- again, I don't know if that is specific to my bottle. The Hydration serum is decent but for the price, there are other better and more affordable options- in my opinion. I didn't notice anything that would make these products stand out, which is disappointing because I have heard so many great things!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products but not sure if it is worth the price...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the nighttime and daytime samples. Overall great products but the price is a little steep in my opinion. The Pixi brand has great alternatives. The Pixi glycolic serum, vitamin c serum, and rose oil blend as much cheaper and works just as well. I did however really enjoy the B-hydra serum and am considering purchasing again. The vitamin c serum had a weird smell though that was off-putting but did slowly fade my acne scars over time.
customer_reviews.author: sarahneu

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: The C-Firma is GREAT! I buy this kit because it’s a lot cheaper than the full size product. The hydrating gel is ok. Nothing crazy
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally amazing! I have pretty normal skin. No acne really and sometimes a troublesome t-zone. The orange serum brightens and reduces redness in my skin. The orange serum is quite sticky though, but when you follow it with the other white serum, it helps it not be so sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Sun damage fading in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: So I won’t show a picture of my face because it’s gross.. I need a lot more help to fix all the damage and abuse and neglect BUT I swear my sun damage discoloration is fading away and it’s only been 3 days. I haven’t seen much change on my acne scaring yet but I was a picker so my scars are bad. Makes my face super shiny and a bit sticky but I’m so happy with the results after just 3 days. I think of I find a good chemical exfoliant on top of this I MIGHT even post a picture of my face in the future !
customer_reviews.author: GinaA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these two serums for my skin. They are pretty pricy for the full sizes so I tried the travel first. Using them both once a day lasted for about a month and a half before having to replace them. I definitely recommend them and will be purchasing the full size next.
customer_reviews.author: shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for one day so I can't review how the product works, but the size is extremely disappointing. I knew it would be tiny but not this tiny. I've seen some people say one pump is enough for your whole face but it's definitely not enough in my opinion. The day/orange one also smells horrible, like expired tootsie rolls and it's absolutely disgusting. Guess I can't expect much size out of a extremely expensive (for no reason) brand. This kit should only be $7-10 considering the size and smell. Definitely not buying again nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive so I expected it to be luxurious and effectively moisturizing. I even combined the two products like suggested. My skin was left dry and I have cheaper products that work exponentially better. Also, I feel ripped off because the bottles are the size of my pinky, I may get a total of 4 uses out these. : (
customer_reviews.author: Lacey R.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it! Could see a difference after one use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this small size just to try the product first. Even after using it once, I could feel the difference in my skin! It makes me face super soft and smooth!! I'll definitely be investing in the larger size... It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good product, give it a try
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for my oily sensitive skin, but the c serum is very sticky by it self, you have to spread it very fast or mix it with the moisturize, felt my skin softer and has a glow
customer_reviews.author: Asrar

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper per ml than the full size.
customer_reviews.text: Just meh. Not worth the money. That being said....these are cheaper per ml than buying the full size.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: saved my skin
customer_reviews.text: Bough a travel size to try. After a month of use I started noticing that my skin has much younger, smoother, healthier look. Maybe result is a combination of all other routines but it I switch between so many creams and washers this one is first to make a difference. Will buy a big size. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love DE products and was very pleased to find them on this site. The minis are perfect for travel, or as a trial to see if you want to purchase larger products. I'm very pleased with the quick delivery, quality of packaging and overall quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C Serum smells and leaves face super sticky
customer_reviews.text: I really like the B-Hydra Intensive Hydration serum but the C-Firma Day Serum is absolutely disgusting. I'm not sure if this was an old product but it goes on super thick and it smells horrendous. My face is so sticky after putting it on and remains that way for hours. I love vitamin c serums but this one was by far the worst I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wilson

customer_reviews.title: USE THIS EVERY MORNING
customer_reviews.text: Still apart of my morning routine and i work graveyard. This is so refreshing, i never thought i would splurge and buy full price bottles but i couldn't help myself after being on the third round of the travel sizes
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture and glow!
customer_reviews.text: These were great to get acquainted with Drunk elephant. I recommend a squirt of each mixed with your moisturizer (and use SPF people). Will definitely be purchasing the full size of these. Also I use these almost daily and they’ve lasted about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Katiana Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but pricey
customer_reviews.text: These product change your skin to the better. I used to think I had skin problems but it turned out I was just not using the right products. I mixed these two product together for a great result. Make-up looks way better on a hydrated skin. The only thing I don't like is how pricey they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the big deal I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the price. It will last if you use a little product. It did a good job on the skin, but no so different for other brands
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Love drunk elephant but items are pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love these items & anything from Drunk elephant as they offer high end effective skin care. Only issue is that they are too pricey even for the smaller containers (which don’t last long) and I can’t afford it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product did nothing
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the sticky feeling I got from using this product. Also there were no visible results at all. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best Vitamin C serum I’ve used outside of Ole Henriksen Truth Serum. I like the B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum for daytime use but still need my Lancôme Energie De Vie on days I wear foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell a difference in my skin when I use these products. My skin looks more vibrant and healthy. If used correctly these little bottles can last for several months!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lee

customer_reviews.title: I like so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’m enjoying this product so far! No off-putting smells or poor quality serum noted. My face seems to accept both products without reaction. Time will tell if said benefits come true!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my face in the morning but has an odd Smokey smell. The smell goes away very quickly but is there at first. My face is much smoother since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: tjaspers

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love DE products cane be expensive but needed travel sizes if these 2 products
customer_reviews.author: Nik  R

customer_reviews.title: Just order it off the website
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend. She personally loves this and is now part of her daily skincare routine; however she found out the vitamin C serum was oxidized and not as effective as it should have been. I’d recommend ordering it from the Drunk Elephant website to make sure you get a fresh serum.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Alice Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Works But Hope You Like The Smell Of Bacon
customer_reviews.text: Smells like bacon, strange but worth it. I noticed a difference in my skin using it twice a week. I mix the two products together and apply to t-zone and around eyes. Takes about two pumps per product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand name. Quality clean ingredients. Very effective for dry aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: The RISE + GLOW in your face is REAL!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a lot of issues with my skin, but i wanted to try an -easy- skin care routine with a certain product that i knew (from a lot of research or reviews) that would be good ! So i've been using this duo (also with de night duo) to see some changes, and it's real, the glow and freshness in my skin ! At the end, it's all about risking, buying this two little ones and trying it with your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Carballeda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong w drunk elephant. Every product has amazed me and I have extremely sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: The Vitamin C part seems pretty great. I noticed my skin was brighter and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Vitamin C part seems pretty great. I noticed my skin was brighter and smoother. The moisturizer - eh.
customer_reviews.author: Audi

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & Firming. Love DE!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether this would work for me because I've heard it causes breakouts for many and I'm extremely acne prone. I love the way it makes my skin look and feel and am now on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: cindy werderitch

customer_reviews.title: Firma-C was oxidized
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin C needs to be used fresh. This product had to be sitting around in the warehouse for a long time because the color had turned dark orange when I used the very day it was delivered. Vitamin C in its useful form should be almost a clear yellow color. I would purchase directly from Drunk Elephant website.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love these products
customer_reviews.text: Love these products, they go on easily so you don’t have to use much and they make my liquid foundation sit so nicely! Combined with the nighttime regimen my redness has significantly reduced and skin is clear and bright. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Collins

customer_reviews.title: I suggest not
customer_reviews.text: I like the day serum but the vitamin c serum was kinda mediocre. It smells and leaves a sticky feel
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Drunk elephant is my favorite product. Use it daily. Happy with my order and shipping was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, but looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very stinky, but it's worth it because it works great. My skin looks really good with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It lasts for a while and I saw a difference Using it. I recommended to a friend and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lawrence Leepson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but love the product.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the products. Only thing was the price. Pretty expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t personally use it but I got it for my mom but she says it good
customer_reviews.author: Brody Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Received empty cyclinder!!
customer_reviews.text: I received an empty cyclinder. How do I get it replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Jane Quinn-Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great product & gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much that I gave these duos out as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Fisher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love the C-Firma Day Serum. I have been using it for about a week or so and have already been asked what I'm doing differently. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherAGA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love the travel size to try out new products. Arrived well packaged and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgal2

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product was damaged the Vitamin C was busted open
customer_reviews.author: barbara martin

customer_reviews.title: Love drunk elephant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products. I am 51 and could see a difference immediately.
customer_reviews.author: tv123

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty disappointed, have ordered this product before, but this time the B -Hydra Intensive Hydration was empty
customer_reviews.author: Karla Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The products were great as are most drunk elephant products, but the bottles were really really tiny, that’s my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Motahar R.

customer_reviews.title: Professional Esthetician's Opinions
customer_reviews.text: I love drunk elephant in general as a brand but these travel sizes make it easy to keep my skin care routine even on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started using them and they feel great on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small bottles
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were much smaller than I was expecting and not all the way full, but I love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Pringle

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the way it felt on my face it was very sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. Have ordered it multiple times and it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: It works and makes your skin look so beautiful, no irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Love DE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products, and they are really improving my skin tone and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Great product...if you receive it
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived without a top, and missing one of the two products inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived unsealed.
customer_reviews.text: Products are great, I’ve used them before, but the package from this seller arrived open. Photo to show.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfLion

customer_reviews.title: Nothing stands out as better than the rest..
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this brand. It is nice but it doesn't appear to be any better than what my current regimen is with another brand that is significantly cheaper. I will have to see a huge difference after I use this all or I won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, not very much product - but meant to be sample size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. I’ve been using for a little over a week and have noticed a huge change in my complexion, specially the brightness of my skin. The serum is not oily at all, sits well under makeup, and feels amazing under your skin. I will be buying the full size product! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Patton

customer_reviews.title: great product great service
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this sample, all organic and beautiful product. Thinking about giving as gifts, so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: LLN

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the size of these tiny bottles. ...
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the size of these tiny bottles. They are actually the size of a sample you would get at a Sephora or a Department store and there wasn't much in the bottles. It was defiantly not worth the money. I can't say much about the product because there wasn't much to try!
customer_reviews.author: Anita S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but these are soooooo small
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but these are soooooo small. Take my advise and get the large size right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Lennea

customer_reviews.title: Smell is horribly wrong for a face lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Did I get a bad batch or has anyone else noticed that the C-firma serum smells like bacon? It's not usually an aroma I am striving for.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor and Brice Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed. It’s the size of my finer.
customer_reviews.text: The size of my finger and my fingers are super skinny. I will take a pic. This is a rip off and is defiantly not worth the price. I have purchased these two items all the time from Sephora. It’s not worth it to purchase it here. It looks like it will last about two days. I wish I could return it, BUT, the package it came in was broken also. Not sure why it came to me like this. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite of the DE line
customer_reviews.text: Of all the drunk elephant products I own.....this is easily my least favorite, which pains me to say because I love drunk elephant. This vitamin c serum really does smell like bacon.....in a bad way. But aside from that, I find it leaves my skin tacky and sticky, just doesn’t absorb well for my skin. The B hydra serum is just ok but I would never purchase in the regular size. I’m sorry drunk elephant but this is just mediocre vitamin c serum that’s hella overpriced. I ended up really loving The Ordinary’s Ascorbyl Glucoside Solution 12% instead which is reasonably priced and works better for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It IMO
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item along with the Drunk Elephant NightBright Duo. These are tiny tiny sample sizes that surprisingly lasted longer than I expected (about a month of every day use). I like them, but I didn't notice enough of a difference in my skin for me to pay this much for sample sizes. That being said, I don't have terrible skin. I am almost 30 and am starting to notice some textural differences and fine lines, so I was looking for something to help with that. I probably won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Madison L

customer_reviews.title: These products are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product!! I have very dry skin and I have tried everything to try to combat the dry, flaky skin. This combination of the hydro gel and C-Firma is amazing for my skin. I saw a big difference within the first week of using this. I have very fair skin as well, and the areas of pigmented skin that I have, are faded and my skin is brighter. I have almost no dryness at all, which is like a miracle for me. Drunk Elephant is the only skin care line I will use now. If you are considering trying these products...DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: andromeda6

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these products a lot and they do wonders for dry skin. I am bumping down the stars because the Vitiman C serum leaks out of the bottle and gets all over. A lot of products and been wasted and it's extremely frustrating considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: HaglerFamily2

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant line. It is good for your skin and is easy to mix and match the products you want. It is a little pricey, but worth it. Seller was courteous and checked on my order to see if I received it and was pleased. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my skin feel and look wonderful. I would recommend and I will be buying a bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: It's the culturally good for people who can't afford the product
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice the smell is lovely but it's incredibly expensive
customer_reviews.author: Ann D

customer_reviews.title: Nice products
customer_reviews.text: The size is nice for travel and the products are great for my skin. I have normal or oily skin and these don’t feel greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ecwstars

customer_reviews.title: Serum
customer_reviews.text: Love this product goes on very light, not stickie, very smooth . Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce delifus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but a little goes a long way. It is worth every penny as l can see and feel the difference in my skin after one week of using.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love! Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love drunk elephant, quality product. You will see a difference in your skin within a week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: teri klein

customer_reviews.title: Broken Seal.
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging seal was broken upon arrival. Can’t tell if the product has been used or not.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Got half of what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: Well, i like drunk elephant but not when i get half of what i ordered. Only recieved the orange topped one. Will be sending it back for credit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Friz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think it would be better for younger skin....very rich
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love everything Drunk Elephant! Definitely a game changer for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: JMacKrell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Product is soo much smaller than expected. Each vial was only usable a handful of times and I really didn’t notice any difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t think it would be the small!! ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it would be the small!! I mean for $23 I would have thought it would be just a smidge bigger I don’t know if I’ll get enough use to decide if I’ll buy the big ones cause I can’t imagine There being enough for more than maybe three days generally when you try your product you want to at least use it for a week to know if it’s something you want there being enough for more than maybe three days generally when you try a product you want to at least use it for a week to know if it’s something you want.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant Time to Wake Up Duo. C-Firma and B-Hydra Day Serums for Clear Skin Complexion and Hydration (Vitamin C Serum, Hydrating Gel Serum).
product_meta.description:
Size:Time to Wake Up DuoTHE PHILOSOPHY
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of the formulations. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety and always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference.

 TIME TO WAKE UP
Up your daytime routine with this dynamic duo! Firm and brighten your skin with C-Firma Day Serum and lock in hydration to nourish your fresh face with B-Hydra, leaving you with a youthful glow. 

 - C-Firma Day Serum
- B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Gel 

 NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesn’t have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent. 

 BREAK THE CYCLE
Drunk Elephant’s formulations are balanced and optimized to work with the physiological processes of the skin to make harsh ingredient indulgences less necessary, less often. With the help of Drunk Elephant, you will finally be able to give your skin a clean break. 

 MADE IN THE USA
Drunk Elephant doesn’t take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
feature_bullets: TIME TO WAKE UP. Treat your skin to a daily dose of vitamins for your fresh morning face with this perfect pair. Your skin will firm and brighten throughout the day, while replenishing essential hydration for a dewy glow.

WHAT IT IS FORMULATED TO DO. The antioxidant packed L-Ascorbic and Ferulic acids in C-Firma will reveal a bright, firm and more even-looking complexion, while the ultra-hydrating serum B-Hydra will replenish your complexion while improving the look of skin texture and tone.

HOW TO USE: Drunk Elephant thinks of skincare routines as “smoothies.” All products are silicone-free + biocompatible with skin so they mix easily together and are highly absorbable. Mix C-Firma and B-Hydra in the palm of your hand and apply in the morning, all at once.

THE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE. Drunk Elephant avoids the “Suspicious 6” (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrance/Dyes and SLS) that they suspect disrupt skin health and are the root of almost every skin issue they see.

BIOCOMPATIBLE. Drunk Elephant formulates with ingredients that skin can easily absorb, understand and benefit from. They don’t care about smelling pretty or changing the look or feel of ingredients, they just let them be what they are naturally.
